snippet: Christian Watford scored 25 points to lead the Hoosiers to a Big Ten victory.
abstract: College Basketball Men's Roundup; Indiana defeats Michigan, 73-71, to remain undefeated at 11-0; other men's and women's college basketball results noted.
lead_paragraph: Christian Watford scored 25 points to lead the Hoosiers to a Big Ten victory.

headline.seo: No. 12 Indiana Holds Off No. 16 Michigan, 73-71
headline.main: Indiana Fights Past Michigan; Pitt Drops to 0-3 in the Big East
headline.print_headline: Indiana Fights Past Michigan; Pitt Drops to 0-3 in the Big East
